item.title: Kubernetes Cluster set up
item.description: Setting up Kubernets cluster A Three node cluster is going to set up and all machies are having Ubuntu 20.04 Installed and Updated Prerequisites : VM with atleast 2GB of RAM and Ubuntu Ubuntu 20.04 2 GB is minimum else will get a message like error execution phase preflight: [preflight] Some fatal errors occurred: [ERROR Mem]: the system RAM (981 MB) is less than the minimum 1700 MB Note : the following steps need to carried out in master and worker nodes
